text: @thatginamiller @SuellaBraverman @BorisJohnson “Covid19 confirmed by antibodies test”. This has to be done after antibodies have developed. So not tested while ill. Surely would have been if the illness was significant. Now appearing to say that recovery from less serious illness took a long time. ???

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
